sentences.en: And God set them in the firmament of heaven to give light upon the earth.
sentences.cn: 他把光体安置在天空,好照亮大地.

sentences.en: And God set them in the firmament of the heaven to give light upon the earth.
sentences.cn: 上帝把它们安放在天穹中,以照亮大地.

sentences.en: And he set them in the firmament of heaven to shine upon the earth.
sentences.cn: 天主将星宿摆列在天空,照耀大地.

sentences.en: Crystal temples all over the Earth held up the Firmament.
sentences.cn: 地球各地的水晶寺庙负责支撑冰天.

sentences.en: Everything Aleck touched turned to fairy gold, and heaped itself glittering toward the firmament.
sentences.cn: 随便什么东西,艾莱柯都能点石成金, 金光闪闪的财富越堆越高,直逼天穹.

sentences.en: He puts the girl on the ground carefully with her face toward the firmament.
sentences.cn: 他警惕翼翼地把她放到地上,让她的脸朝上.

sentences.en: He rose his head and stared at the firmament.
However, they underestimated the effect of the destabilization of the Firmament.
sentences.cn: 然而, 他们低估了冰天动摇的整体性.

sentences.en: Initially, the strategy was to destroy the Firmament above the enemy.
sentences.cn: 一开始, 他们的策略是摧毁敌人上方的冰天.

sentences.en: The heavens declare the glory of God; and the firmament sheweth his handywork.
sentences.cn: 1诸天述说神的荣耀, 穹苍传扬他的手段.

sentences.en: The smallest pond at night mirrors the firmament above.
sentences.cn: 夜晚,最小的池塘映射出星空.

sentences.en: There are no stars in the firmament.
What is the world if compared to the least visible star in the firmament?
sentences.cn: 即使与天空中最暗弱的恒星相比,这世界又算得上什么?
